title: How the Fed can control inflation
itunes:title: How the Fed can control inflation
description: Joe Zhao, former Fed economist and founder of venture fund Millennial Capital, shares an inside view of the Fed’s policymaking process and the private equity market. We discuss what the Fed should do to control inflation… Joe’s take on SPACs… how a successful private equity fund approaches opportunities in the private market… how the government will regulate crypto… and why it’s time to buy IPOs. In this episode:  How the Fed can slow inflation [0:19]  The psychology behind successful investing [12:58]  How a successful private equity fund decides what to buy [18:32]  The main goal of both venture capitalists and SPACs [26:57]  How the government with regulate crypto [32:15]  Why it’s time to starting buying IPOs [40:27]   Enjoyed this episode?
